description:
In order to bring the final God candidate into a discussion, Mirai and the other four God candidates reach out to them through a live TV broadcast. As the situation grows tense when Self-Defense Force attack helicopters show up, the last God candidate finally appears.
His name is Gaku Yoneda. Known as the world`s smartest man, he`s a Nobel Prize recipient and college professor. Yoneda`s involvement causes people around the world to swell with excitement. Then Yoneda begins to explain his theory regarding God to Mirai and the other God candidates.
Source: crunchyroll
